thread.title: Bollywood diva turns 'porter' for reality show
thread.title_full: Bollywood diva turns 'porter' for reality show - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Bollywood diva turns 'porter' for reality show
text: New Delhi, Oct 24 (ANI): Bollywood actress Viday Balan was recently spotted working as a porter at Sindhi Camp bus stand of Jaipur.She was shooting for an upcoming TV series of Colors called 'Mission Sapney' wherein she stepped in the shoes of a lady porter and worked to earn bread butter of the day for her.'Mission Sapne' is a television reality series which aims to blur out the lines between the life of a star and a common man.A-listers like Salman Khan , Ranbir Kapoor, Varun Dhawan, and Karan Johar and few others were part of the last season of the show. The show is expected to be aired soon on entertainment channel Colors. Â»
